text: Neil Entwistle (born 18 September 1978 in Nottinghamshire, England) is a British convicted double murderer (of his wife and baby girl) who is currently serving two consecutive life sentences in the state of Massachusetts in the United States. A search of Entwistle's computer showed that days before the murders, Entwistle looked at a website that described "how to kill people". == References == == Other websites == * The case of Entwistle Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English people convicted of murder Category:English prisoners Category:People from Nottinghamshire
title: Neil Entwistle
